page.title: 17SHOPPING FACILITIES
page.content: There is a wide variety of foodshops in Huntly,ranging from supermarkets to small businesses.Mace,Spar,Co-op and the Centra are examples of modern self -service shops.They provide a great variety of products,some of them incorporate a bakers shop.All shops reported that their busiest days were Thursdays to Saturdays when many people from the surrounding areas are in town.When these shops provide special offers there was an increase in the sale of that product.Our butchers shops and bakers shops are family run concerns.
